description:
Run through the mountains carrying only your essentials. Bounce-free stability holds your water, snacks and race-day gear comfortably in place, with a dedicated compartment for the included hydration reservoir to make your aid station stops a breeze. Plenty of adjustment options keep it close as you move

  • Stretch-woven nylon won’t stretch out over time
  • Soft edge binding prevents chafing
  • Dual water bottle pockets with stash pockets for gels
  • Hook-and-loop shoulder adjustment won’t loosen as you run
  • Vertically adjustable sternum straps (top one has hydration hose clip)
  • Pockets in hip fin provide easy access to small items
  • Includes TPU Hydrapak Elite 1L reversible reservoir, with leakproof slide closure
  • Hook-and-loop hanger keeps reservoir from sagging
  • Chest circumference 89-112cm
name: MEC Pace Running Vest - Unisex
